Question: The depot has been named the ____ Depot Museum.
Hints: On February 24, 1886, at the age of thirty-nine, this person married the 20-year-old Mina Miller (1866–1947) in Akron, Ohio.
Mina outlived this person, dying on August 24, 1947.
This person became known as "The Wizard of Menlo Park," New Jersey.
